name: Doctor Eion
description:
Welcome!

Ever wanted to help out a little mutated humanoid mushroom guy? Well, here you go!

You help Eion pick up some lotus for a bath and tea for his boyfriend while following the little parcour that is in your way!

What are you waiting for?
Just jump right in.

------------------------------------

------------------------------------

I hope you will have fun and enjoy the little swamp ambience!

------------------------------------

------------------------------------

Sadly you may encounter some problems while trying to play, since I didnt got to optimize the game like I wanted and because of that my game isnt going to work on everybodys pc.

------------------------------------

------------------------------------

Controls:
Move: WASD / Left Joystick
Camera: Mouse / Right Joystick
Jump: Space / Down Button
Interact: E/Right Button
Pause: ESC / Start Button

------------------------------------

How to install

Doctor Eion is designed for Windows PC.

1. Download ZIP file 
2. Right click and extract the file
3. Save the file 4. Start the .exe   
5. Enjoy!
